listType - The type of the blacklist

Returns:

setAccessSchedule

void setAccessSchedule(com.oregonscientific.meep.permission.User user,
                       List<com.oregonscientific.meep.permission.Permission> permissions)
                       throws RemoteException
Replace the permissions for each package. All existing entrie in the local data store will be removed and replaced with permissions

Note

The operation can be lock access to the underlying data store for a long period of time if the list is large. Use this function is caution

Parameters:
user - The user the permission schedule to apply to
permissions - An list of Permission objects that contains every package's permission
Throws:
RemoteException

updatePermission

void updatePermission(com.oregonscientific.meep.permission.User user,
                      com.oregonscientific.meep.permission.Permission permission)
                      throws RemoteException
Update the given permission for the given user

Parameters:
user - The user to set permission against
permission - The permission to update
Throws:
RemoteException

setBlacklist

void setBlacklist(com.oregonscientific.meep.permission.User user,
                  List<com.oregonscientific.meep.permission.Blacklist> blacklist)
                  throws RemoteException
Replace the blacklist in local data store with blacklist. All existing entries in the local data store will be removed and replaced with blacklist

Note

The operation can be lock access to the underlying data store for a long period of time if the list is large. Use this function is caution

Parameters:
user - The user's blacklist to replace
blacklist - An list of Blacklist Objects which is the entire blacklist
Throws:
RemoteException

setBadwordList

void setBadwordList(com.oregonscientific.meep.permission.User user,
                    List<com.oregonscientific.meep.permission.BadWord> badwords)
                    throws RemoteException
Replace the bad word list. All entries in the local data store will be removed and replaced with badwords

Note

The operation can be lock access to the underlying data store for a long period of time if the list is large. Use this function is caution

Parameters:
user - The user's bad word list to replace
badwords - An list of BadWord objects which is the entire bad word list
Throws:
RemoteException

addBadword

boolean addBadword(com.oregonscientific.meep.permission.User user,
                   com.oregonscientific.meep.permission.BadWord badword)
                   throws RemoteException
Add a bad word into the local bad word list.

Parameters:
user - The user whose bad word list to apply to
badword - A badword to be added into the local bad word list
Returns:
true if the bad word is successfully added to local store, false if the bad word cannot be added or the bad word already exist in the data store
Throws:
RemoteException

removeBadword

boolean removeBadword(com.oregonscientific.meep.permission.User user,
                      com.oregonscientific.meep.permission.BadWord badword)
                      throws RemoteException
Remove a bad word from the local bad word list

Parameters:
user - The user whose bad word list to apply to
badword - A badword to be removed from the local bad word list
Returns:
trueif the bad word is successfully removed from local store, false if the bad word cannot be removed or the bad word does not exist in the data store
Throws:
RemoteException
